column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=For Christmas last year , my family had a very big get together and everyone was tasked with making and\/or bringing a food item .
#text=I did n't know what to bring , so I simply asked my Aunt what she would like .
#text=She told me that she would love a cake , as there was a shortage of people bringing dessert .
#text=I figured that I should bake it myself since I do not bake fairly often .
#text=I looked throughout my pantry and realized I had everything I needed .
#text=I went ahead and made it the evening before using all of the ingredients .
#text=I mixed the flour , sugar , water , eggs and even made my own frosting and did n't use one from a can .
#text=It turned out very moist , sweet and very good tasting .
#text=The next day I brought the cake over to my family gathering and it was a big hit .
#text=Afterwards , my aunt and other family members thanked me very much .
